SELECT p.PROD_NUMBER AS prod_number, p.CATE_CD AS cate_cd, p.PROD_NAME AS prod_name, p.DESCRIPTION AS description, p.MANUFACTURE AS manufacture, p.PRICE AS price, p.DISCOUNT AS discount, p.SALEPRICE AS salePrice, p.DELIVERY_FEE AS delivery_fee, p.IMG_1 AS img_1, p.IMG_2 AS img_2, p.IMG_3 AS img_3, p.DETAIL_IMG AS detail_img, p.PROD_STAT AS prod_stat, p.PROD_TAX AS prod_tax, p.PROD_BUSINESS AS prod_business, p.PROD_NATION AS prod_nation, p.HIT AS hit, p.PRO_SCORE AS pro_score, p.REG_DATE AS reg_date, NVL(r.reviewCount, 0) AS reviewCount, NVL(r.avgScore, 0) AS avgScore, NVL(s.soldCount, 0) AS soldCount FROM PRODUCT p
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT PROD_NUMBER, COUNT(*) AS reviewCount, NVL(AVG(RATING), 0) AS avgScore FROM REVIEW GROUP BY PROD_NUMBER ) r ON p.PROD_NUMBER = r.PROD_NUMBER
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT PROD_NUMBER, SUM(PIECE) AS soldCount FROM ORDERDETAIL GROUP BY PROD_NUMBER ) s ON p.PROD_NUMBER = s.PROD_NUMBER
WHERE 1=1
AND (
p.PROD_NAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
OR p.DESCRIPTION LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
OR TO_CHAR(p.PRICE) LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
)
AND p.CATE_CD LIKE #{cate_cd} || '%'
AND p.PRICE >= #{minPrice}
AND p.PRICE <= #{maxPrice}
ORDER BY s.soldCount DESC ORDER BY p.SALEPRICE ASC ORDER BY p.SALEPRICE DESC ORDER BY r.avgScore DESC ORDER BY r.reviewCount DESC ORDER BY p.REG_DATE DESC
SELECT * FROM REVIEW WHERE PROD_NUMBER = #{prod_number} ORDER BY R_DATE DESC
